version_description: fix upload photo albums

Thanks to all your feedbacks, Klassroom has been completely revamped to bring you more flexibility and more powerful features for your classroom.
- Faster
- Edit pictures and blur faces
- Filter your post by type
- Schedule posts and electronic signature
- Group chats
- More admin rights to manage users and the class...

- Improving network connection
- Redirection from Notifications
- In app notifications
- Send reminders to members who didn't view or sign a post

- Fix Photo upload in post
- Add Spanish support

Are you ready for this new school year? We too !
We are very happy to present the new version of Klassroom! This version 3 brings a lot of novelties:

• Textbook / homework: you can now share with parents the homework to do
• Surveys: Would you like to ask parents for their opinion on the best time to organize the next meeting? It's now possible to have an answer in a few clicks!
• Lists: A school trip in the forest is planned? Parents should not forget to put in the schoolbag a sandwich, a kway and rain boots? The list function will be very useful!
• Pictures and a video on the same publication or pictures and voice messages of children on the same publication? It is now possible to join different types of files in the same publication!
• You can now moderate parents' comments before they are published.
• You can directly access upcoming events, assignments and appointments.
• You can now make sure that messages sent in private have been read. We added acknowledgments in private conversations.

Thank you to our teacher ambassadors who throughout the year 2017-2018 have made us so complete and benevolent feedback. This version 3 is also theirs. Thank you !

See you soon on Klassroom!

See you soon on Klassroom!

There are already more than 120,000 users in Klassroom!
The more the #TeamKlassroom community grows, the better the ideas will be to improve the app even more!
These are the main new features in version 3.1:
- Extension of translation functionality between teachers and multilingual parents: messages are now translated in both directions, in the news feed, in the comments and in private conversations.
- New homework organization: homeworks no longer appear on the feed, but in a separate block that brings them all together. The possibility of sharing clickable links has been added as well.
- Improved photo management: it is now possible to publish up to 32 photos in a publication. Photos are available in landscape mode. Possibility of importing photos from different services in the cloud.
- Possibility of adding members in a private conversation.
- Improved rights for class members: Owner, Administrator, Contributor, Member, Invisible. More details in our F.A.Q.
- Division of closed and active classes in the list of classes.
- Direct link added to publications in email notifications.
- Addition of emojis and animated GIF
- Possibility of notifying users if a publication is modified.
- Several improvements and bug fixes: telephone code management for India and other Asian countries. Classification of members in alphabetical order. Screen corrections for posts that contain multiple audio messages, images and documents. Add and search of schools by postal code.

Do not hesitate to send us your comments at hello@klassroom.co

Update of libraries & Minor bug fixing

After 170,000 users joined, 1.5 million photos of life moments shared, and over 10 million interactions between parents and teachers, we are pleased to introduce the new version of Klassroom, the app that reinvents parent-teachers communication. Version 4 goes further to simplify your daily life and reinforce the crucial link between families and schools. These are its main new functions:

•An improved user-friendly design that even the least tech-savvy parents and teachers can use with ease.
•Call handling: Teachers can make calls from Klassroom in seconds.
•Attendance: Attendance reports can be generated for a school’s administration directly in Klassboard, a new tool dedicated to principals.
•Appointment Management: Teachers can show availability slots, and parents can request appointments for those times.
•The Year Book: Later in the year, parents can order a paper photo book or an interactive photo book from the school year.
•KYS (Know Your Student): Parent’s can provide teachers with useful information about their child (hobbies, passions, fears, etc) so that teachers can personalize his/her teaching when necessary to better engage a student and maintain great classroom morale for every child. (This information is only accessible to the teacher)
•VoiceOver: Support is provided for parents and teachers with visual impairments
•Extended translation support: 35,000 messages have already been translated and helped families overcome a language barrier with their relationship to their school.

It’s time to start, create your class and go!

Team Klassroom

After 170,000 users joined, 1.5 million photos of life moments shared, and over 10 million interactions between parents and teachers, we are pleased to introduce the new version of Klassroom, the app that reinvents parent-teachers communication. Version 4 goes further to simplify your daily life and reinforce the crucial link between families and schools. These are its main new functions:

•An improved user-friendly design that even the least tech-savvy parents and teachers can use with ease.
•Call handling: Teachers can make calls from Klassroom in seconds.
•Attendance: Attendance reports can be generated for a school’s administration directly in Klassboard, a new tool dedicated to principals.
•Appointment Management: Teachers can show availability slots, and parents can request appointments for those times.
•The Year Book: Later in the year, parents can order a paper photo book or an interactive photo book from the school year.
•KYS (Know Your Student): Parent’s can provide teachers with useful information about their child (hobbies, passions, fears, etc) so that teachers can personalize his/her teaching when necessary to better engage a student and maintain great classroom morale for every child. (This information is only accessible to the teacher)
•VoiceOver: Support is provided for parents and teachers with visual impairments
•Extended translation support: 35,000 messages have already been translated and helped families overcome a language barrier with their relationship to their school.

It’s time to start, create your class and go!

Team Klassroom

We added:
- Do Not Disturb feature
- Ability to merge duplicate students
- Survey not mandatory for parents

- Add and remove availabilities on a specific day with repetition
- Pinned posts unlocked

Video Conference: start a video or audio conference with one or more parents

klasswork beta
klasssbook beta

With Klassroom v5, continue to improve communication between parents and teachers in schools and get ready now to ensure pedagogical continuity in the event of a school closure.

• Elegant design for better readability
• Rich Text: format the text of your publications (bold, color, italics, underline).
• Klasswork: advanced homework management. Submit your homework. Then parents can very easily hand over child labor. You can write comments, corrections for each child and find it all in one well organized place!

The V5 also includes a video conferencing feature which was initiated during the content.
